data.name: MSG_SonarScannerCalling
data.value: Calling the SonarQube Scanner...

data.name: WARN_FileIsOutsideProjectDirectory
data.value: File '{0}' is not located under the root directory '{1}' and will not be analyzed.

data.name: MSG_GeneratingProjectProperties
data.value: Generating SonarQube project properties file to {0}

data.name: MSG_NoFilesToAnalyze
data.value: The project does not contain any files that can analyzed by SonarQube. Project file: {0}

data.name: MSG_ProjectIsExcluded
data.value: The exclude flag has been set so the project will not be analyzed by SonarQube. Project file: {0}

data.name: MSG_PropertiesGenerationFailed
data.value: Generation of the sonar-properties file failed. Unable to complete SonarQube analysis.

data.name: MSG_SonarScannerCompleted
data.value: The SonarQube Scanner has finished

data.name: MSG_WritingSummary
data.value: Writing processing summary to {0}

data.name: ERR_ErrorLoadingConfigFile
data.value: An error occurred loading the analysis config file. Please check that it is a valid file and try again. Error: {0}

data.name: ERR_InvalidCommandLineArgs
data.value: Expected to be called with one argument: the full path to the analysis config file

data.name: ERR_NoProjectInfoFilesFound
data.value: The SonarQube MSBuild integration failed: SonarQube was unable to collect the required information about your projects. Possible causes: 1. The project has not been built - the project must be built in between the begin and end steps 2. An unsupported version of MSBuild has been used to build the project. Currently MSBuild 14.0 upwards are supported 3. The begin, build or end steps have not all been launched from the same folder 4. None of the analyzed projects have a GUID and you haven't used any solution (.sln)

data.name: ERR_NoValidProjectInfoFiles
data.value: No analysable projects were found. SonarQube analysis will not be performed. Check the build summary report for details.

data.name: ERR_SonarScannerExecutionFailed
data.value: The SonarQube Scanner did not complete successfully

data.name: MSG_SonarScannerOptsDefaultUsed
data.value: {0} is not configured. Setting it to the default value of {1}

data.value: {0} is already set. Value: {1}

data.name: WARN_CodeCoverageReportNotFound
data.value: Code coverage report does not exist at the specified location. Path: {0}

data.name: WARN_DuplicateProjectGuid
data.value: Duplicate project GUID: "{0}". Check that the project is only being built for a single platform/configuration and that that the project guid is unique. The project will not be analyzed by SonarQube. Project file: {1}

data.name: WARN_FileDoesNotExist
data.value: File '{0}' does not exist.

data.name: WARN_InvalidProjectGuid
data.value: The project has an invalid GUID "{0}". The project will not be analyzed by SonarQube. Project file: {1}

data.name: MSG_SonarScannerHomeIsSet
data.value: The SONAR_SCANNER_HOME environment variable is not required and will be ignored.

data.name: MSG_SettingAnalysisProperty
data.value: Setting analysis property: {0}={1}

data.name: WARN_OverridingAnalysisProperty
data.value: Overriding analysis property. Effective value: {0}={1}

data.name: MSG_MandatorySettingIsCorrectlySpecified
data.value: Analysis property is already correctly set: {0}={1}

data.name: ERR_NoValidButDuplicateProjects
data.value: No analysable projects were found but some duplicate project IDs were found. Possible cause: you are building multiple configurations (e.g. DEBUG|x86 and RELEASE|x64) at the same time, which is not supported by the SonarQube integration. Please build and analyze each configuration individually.

data.name: ERR_ConflictingSonarProjectProperties
data.value: sonar-project.properties files are not understood by the SonarQube Scanner for MSBuild. Remove those files from the following folders: {0}

data.name: MSG_SarifFileNotFound
data.value: No Code Analysis ErrorLog file found at {0}.

data.value: Fixed invalid Code Analysis ErrorLog file. Please check that VS 2015 Update 1 (or later) is installed. Fixed file: {0}

data.name: WARN_SarifFixFail
data.value: Failed to fix Code Analysis ErrorLog file. Please check that VS 2015 Update 1 (or later) is installed.

data.name: MSG_SarifFileIsInvalid
data.value: The supplied Code Analysis ErrorLog file is not a valid json file: {0}

data.name: MSG_SarifFileIsValid
data.value: The supplied Code Analysis ErrorLog file is a valid json file and does not need to be fixed: {0}
